summary: I really hope Beau's greivances with Jester, Fjord & Nott over the super fucked up slave ruse actually get acknowledged and...
body: I really hope Beau’s greivances with Jester, Fjord & Nott over the super fucked up slave ruse actually get acknowledged and listened to but seeing how this shit’s gone in the past, it’s gonna get .5 seconds of bullshit discussion and they everybody’s gonna scream at Caleb for 45 minutes because he dared to try to keep the party out of prison.

summary: Me glancing at the KS page today: “So just raise the original goal amount on top of this, and we’re good for getting the whole...
body:
Me glancing at the KS page today: “So just raise the original goal amount on top of this, and we’re good for getting the whole series!”

Me a few seconds later, having absorbed that: “…we are in very weird territory, aren’t we.”

reblog.comment:

summary: I need more friends
body:
I need more friends

I’m just looking for some more peeps to talk to about all kinds of stuff

- Video games

- Movies

- Steven Universe

- Currently new to Critical Role

- Of course anime

- Although I’m not ace I would love to learn more about it

Feel free to always talk to me. DMs always open

summary: The Youtube comments are usually a trash fire but I just need to bring attention to my new favorite description of the...
body:
The Youtube comments are usually a trash fire but I just need to bring attention to my new favorite description of the Dodecahedron moment:

the equivalent of pulling baby Jesus out of your pocket in the middle of the vatican﻿

Like, you’re not wrong, anonymous Youtube commenter. You are very much not wrong.

blog.name: punkyy-bear
blog.title: Punky Bear
blog.description:
dnd hoe. yall should ask me stuff
im a goblin now i guess

summary: The harness controversy
body:
The harness controversy

…what the fuck man

Look. I know. It was just for fun and trolling from Travis and Laura. But like. Still. Its been bugging me (not mad at the cast. Im just thinking of how this is going to effect Beau and Calab)

Especially when Fjord pushed Beau into the mud. That was before the facade even needed to be put up. It obviously made them really uncomfortable already. But then there friends use them. Belittle them. Dehumanize them. It really seemed like trust was abused

Especially since the two couldnt fight back. Both physically and because they’d blow their cover. They couldn’t do anything

Plus the two who had to just watch (Clay and Yasha) as there friends bullied and belittled there other friends. They couldnt stop it. They just had to watch. Again. So cover was not blown.

And now. To the backgrounds. Beau has a deep problem with authority. Seeing power as something that twists and changes people for the worst. This likely proved her point and will just deepen her hate for authority. These people who she trusted to have power over her for a moment abused it immediately. And she’s already felt pretty usless most of her home life. Plus being forcibly dragged away by monks. Like. Holy fuck. I really think this will fuck her up

And Caleb. Canonly he has been tourtered and abused by people he admirred. People have constantly abused there power of Caleb. Which is why I think Caleb dosent like to be seen as a leader. He was in a postion of powerlessness over most of his life and still likely feels that way now. Then people he trusts do it again. Fuck with the power he gave them for a facade. He still cares about them. Shown through trying to keep them alive afterwords. But i still think this will fuck up his connection to them. And Nott is usually extremely supportive and now is suddenly the bully. That cant be easy

I still love Fjord and Jester and Nott. But i think this will deeply fuck up the bond between the nien.

I hope Liam and Marisha bring it into the story. I think it would a great really memorable moment where the nien talks about trust

tags: ngl i want to write all these routes
summary:
I love that the Travis/Marisha/Liam side of the table sometimes
just looks like a roster of Love Interests for a dating sim...
body:
I love that the Travis/Marisha/Liam side of the table sometimes just looks like a roster of Love Interests for a dating sim where Jester is the MC. So I wrote otome game-style introductions for each of them because uhhh this idea is endlessly amusing to me:

~ The Warlock Mariner ~

Charming and dependable, ♥ Fjord ♥ is your close confidant and oldest friend. You’ve looked out for each other since day one, and you can trust that he will always have your back. Handsome, kind, and occasionally dense, Fjord appears to be the perfect guy to set sail your dream romance. But beneath the warlock’s friendly exterior lies a private person who is just as new to love as you are, and he’s determined to keep his true feelings close to port. Is your connection strong enough to weather the incoming sea of ancient secrets, or will your relationship be Eldritch Blasted before it’s even begun…?

~ The Rebel Monk ~

♥ Beauregard ♥ is your trusty roommate and partner-in-crime. The rest of the world knows her to be cocky and abrasive, but around you she reveals a softer, sweeter side of herself—one that’s always ready to go along with your shenanigans and support you in everything you do. Despite the fun you have together, you’re certain Beau sees you as only a friend. Why else would she be trying to sleep with every woman in the room except you?! The monk keeps insisting she’s not relationship material, but the closer you grow to her, the more possible it seems she might land a Stunning Strike on your heart…

~ The Wizard Fugitive ~

You and ♥ Caleb ♥ got off to a rocky start, but you quickly discover his cold, secretive demeanour masks a fiery wit and surprising thoughtfulness. He’s always willing to lend you a helping hand or a sympathetic ear, but you sense he wants to warn you that he is more dangerous than he appears. The ghosts in his eyes indicate this warning may even ring true, but more than anything you want to unearth the mysteries of the past that scars him so. Can you melt his defenses and Polymorph your delicate friendship into something more? Or is it true when they say if you play with fire, you’ll only get burned…?

You and ♥ Caleb ♥ got off to a rocky start, but you quickly discover his cold, secretive demeanour masks a fiery wit and surprising thoughtfulness. He’s always willing to lend you a helping hand or a sympathetic ear, but you sense he wants to warn you that he is more dangerous than he appears. The ghosts in his eyes indicate this warning may even ring true, but more than anything you want to unearth the mysteries of the past that scars him so. Can you melt his defenses and Polymorph your delicate friendship into something more? Or is it true when they say if you play with fire, you’ll only get burned…?
trail.content:
I love that the Travis/Marisha/Liam side of the table sometimes just looks like a roster of Love Interests for a dating sim where Jester is the MC. So I wrote otome game-style introductions for each of them because uhhh this idea is endlessly amusing to me:

~ The Warlock Mariner ~

Charming and dependable, ♥ Fjord ♥ is your close confidant and oldest friend. You’ve looked out for each other since day one, and you can trust that he will always have your back. Handsome, kind, and occasionally dense, Fjord appears to be the perfect guy to set sail your dream romance. But beneath the warlock’s friendly exterior lies a private person who is just as new to love as you are, and he’s determined to keep his true feelings close to port. Is your connection strong enough to weather the incoming sea of ancient secrets, or will your relationship be Eldritch Blasted before it’s even begun…?

~ The Rebel Monk ~

♥ Beauregard ♥ is your trusty roommate and partner-in-crime. The rest of the world knows her to be cocky and abrasive, but around you she reveals a softer, sweeter side of herself—one that’s always ready to go along with your shenanigans and support you in everything you do. Despite the fun you have together, you’re certain Beau sees you as only a friend. Why else would she be trying to sleep with every woman in the room except you?! The monk keeps insisting she’s not relationship material, but the closer you grow to her, the more possible it seems she might land a Stunning Strike on your heart…

~ The Wizard Fugitive ~

You and ♥ Caleb ♥ got off to a rocky start, but you quickly discover his cold, secretive demeanour masks a fiery wit and surprising thoughtfulness. He’s always willing to lend you a helping hand or a sympathetic ear, but you sense he wants to warn you that he is more dangerous than he appears. The ghosts in his eyes indicate this warning may even ring true, but more than anything you want to unearth the mysteries of the past that scars him so. Can you melt his defenses and Polymorph your delicate friendship into something more? Or is it true when they say if you play with fire, you’ll only get burned…?

blog.description:
Graye ⭐ she/her ⭐
A Critical Role sideblog where I can yell about these nerdy ass voice actors and the world they have created to my heart's content. I try to tag 'cr spoilers' until the following Friday. I follow back/reply as pan-galactic-gargle-blast. Banner art is by Anna Landin (annalandin.tumblr.com)!
